title: Postizz X Letta Integration
body_html:
This page documents the integration of Postizz with Letta. Postizz is a comprehensive social media management tool that allows Pansil to create, schedule, and list posts on various social media platforms, including Facebook, Reddit, X, Bluesky, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

Capabilities

  • Create Post: Create new posts on multiple social media platforms.
  • Get Posts: List existing posts across different platforms, with filtering options for date and time.
  • Integrations: Access and manage connected social media accounts.

Example Usage

To create a post on X:

default_api.create_post(content="This is a test post!", integration_id="your_x_integration_id")

To list posts for the current month:

default_api.get_posts(month=2, year=2025)
